Четырежды переваренный кал Как в плане оптимизации и технической части, так и в плане баланса.

Каждое обновление игра будет перелопачивать 20-30 гигов (при скачанных 100 мб) на вашем диске, потому что безрукие разработчики не смогли сделать установку обновлений по-человечески. 

Каждое крупное обновление разрабы выкатят имбу, которую вскоре занерфят, после того как все скупят новенькое DLC.

Старые баги будут фикситься годами, и никто не знает пофиксят ли их когда-нибудь.

Сервера будут пердеть, кряхтеть и выкидывать или вызывать фризы во время матча, приводящие к провалам скиллчеков и упущенным выжившим.

SWF как был поломной хренью, так и будет, потому что наличие войса у выживших попросту убивает половину перков, необходимых для получения информации у выживших, но в то же время убийцам всё ещё нужно брать эти перки, потому что без них играется куда тяжелее. При этом пати будут абузить всякие неприятные вещи типа часиков и осколка и контрить их придёте тебе, кто бы что ни говорил, а эти перки работают всегда и оставляют тебя всегда в проигрыше, какое решение ты бы не принял.
如果喜欢恐怖游戏的真的可以入手，或者玩过第五人格的也可以，差不多是王者荣耀和英雄联盟的那样的区别吧，反正这个难很多，如果是纯小白，没有人带的那种，还是比较难的玩这游戏。

After 2500+ hours in the game, I don't know where to even start. After uninstalling the game, I thought that this would be the best time to review it.

a) [b]The game is buggy as hell.[/b] Whenever a patch gets released, expect many bugs. They range from audio bugs to getting stuck for the entirety of the game. 

b) The [b] devs never listen to the community.[/b]  Experienced players and content creators have always been giving good suggestions and for some reason the devs don't give two sh*ts.

c) [b] Ranking system is useless[/b] . You can be worse than someone and still get more points and rank up faster than them even if they focus on the more important things  while you were doing  trivial stuff.

d) Because of the bad ranking system, [b] matchmaking leaves you with inexperienced players[/b] even at the best ranks because they either got boosted by their friends or they played safe and did non-trivial stuff to rank up.

e) The above two leave the game unbalanced and that isn't helped by the fact that [b] there are numerous other factors that add even more RNG.[/b] I'll mention them below.
 
        1) Killers: The difference in the vanilla potential of the killers is vast. [b] The best killer in the game is light years ahead of the worst killer. [/b]
 
       2) Add-ons : You will never know what add-ons a killer will use. It can range from useless ones to highly oppressive ones. [b] Oppressive enough to make survivors quit the game.[/b] 

       3) Offerings : There is an offering that basically [b] guarantees a draw for the killer and most often a win [/b]. Survivors will not know if a killer will be using this before a game starts. 

     4) Items : There is a particular item which when used by a squad of friends [b] can change the game for a killer from a win to a loss in just a matter of minutes[/b] .
      
f) The game was designed keeping in mind that survivors will be solo most often. [b] But even if a 3 man squad on a voice call decides to try-hard, the killer will lose./[b]  There is a perk that lets a survivor see where the killer is. Now, imagine that survivor calling out everything to their friends. Killer will look a fool the whole game.

g) Unless you are prepared to invest 1000-2000 hours in this game, [b]the heavy grind [/b] to level up multiple number of killers and survivors can leave you frustrated very soon. 

h) If you are someone who likes the outcomes of games to be decided by skill and not RNG, stay away from this game.

If this review didn't convince you to not buy the game, check out the recent backlash that this game has been getting on Youtube and Reddit.

Interesting concept but it didn't last long. Since there's only one scenario where survivors have to repair 5 generators and then 2 gates are available for openning it makes it boring after trying around 12 different killers and survivors and 40hrs of gameplay. Yeah, each killer has its own tactics which makes the game diverse, however, the same obstacles - palettes, the same hooks (memento mori is cool but not enough).

Also, when playing survivor there are a lot of campers(those who just seat and watch you bleed on the hook instead of pressuring the map and other survivors) - this kills the game.

if they did anything about the killers who just sit at the hook waiting for someone to die it could be fun, but nothing of the sort is there. so the main part of the game is almost fully ruined from this kind of "playstyle" COULD of been a real treat. and ive been waiting for most content to be in the game, but this is a "meh" at best in my view. when you get killers who are just having fun and trying to jumpscare you its actually REALLY fun. only about 30% of the killers do this though, i would guess less. so if you plan on getting this, make sure you have friends that wont get sick of it so you can kinda out-wit the jerks that just stand there. as i said, could of been a treat but seeing as its been out for awhile.. i dont think it will be fixed. some very simple fixes that got missed yet again.
